TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ImageMapEventHandler(object sender, ImageMapEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ImageMapEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ImageMapEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ImageMapEventArgs)
public delegate void ImageMapEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ImageMapEventArgs ^ e);
type ImageMapEventHandler = delegate of obj * ImageMapEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 类型的参数。

span.span: The argument of type that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 控件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识用于处理事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that handles the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件创建事件处理程序 。The following code example demonstrates how to create an event handler for the event. 控件包含两个 对象。The control contains two objects. 属性设置为 `HotSpotMode.PostBack` ，这会使页面在用户每次单击其中一个对象时都回发到服务器 。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the objects. 事件由 `VoteMap_Clicked` 事件处理程序进行处理。The event is handled by the `VoteMap_Clicked` event handler. 若要使此示例正常工作，必须为属性提供自己的图像 ，并适当地更新图像的路径，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/CS/imagemapclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/VB/imagemapclass2vb.aspx#1)]

related.span: ASP.NET 服务器控件事件模型
